jobDescription:
### Ready to Learn More About Us?

We were founded in 2010 with a dynamic and agile start-up spirit. The trust of around 30 million customers and 250,000 sellers has made us the first decacorn in Turkey. Our success is backed by renowned investors such as Alibaba, General Atlantic, Softbank, Princeville Capital, and several sovereign wealth funds. In 2022, we opened our first dedicated international office in Berlin and expanded to Amsterdam, Luxembourg, and London. And that's just the beginning!

### Tech at the Root

We believe that technology is the driver and e-commerce is the outcome. Thanks to the dedication of our team, we have become one of the top 5 e-commerce companies in EMEA and one of the fastest-growing worldwide. We currently deliver over 1.5 million parcels daily to 27 countries.

### Growth is in Our DNA

As a young and dynamic company, we are constantly growing and expanding. With PIA Tech, one of the leading R&D centres, PIA Express, the fastest-growing delivery network, SecondPIA, the largest platform for second-hand goods, and PIA Go, our instant food and grocery delivery service, we are gearing up to become the world's leading e-commerce platform.

### Focused on Positive Impact

Our vision goes beyond business success. We strive to make a sustainable and positive impact on our customers, business partners, and society. By digitizing merchants and SMEs, helping businesses grow, and promoting women's economic empowerment, we are dedicated to creating a better future.

## About the Team

If you are a techie, you belong in our Technology Team that builds scalable, high-performance platforms for our customers using up-to-date and efficient technologies.

We are all working with the same purpose: To create a positive impact in our ecosystem by enabling commerce through technology.

## Your Main Responsibilities

- Coding new features and improving the existing platform to exalt the PIA platform experience and scale.
- Continuously improving yourself with your team members, learning new technologies, and acquiring new skills.
- Participating in planning meetings, estimating tasks, doing code reviews, and coding in pairs.

## Qualities We Are Looking For

- **Team Player** - humble, lifelong learner, and has a customer-first mindset.
- Practical knowledge about OOP, Design Patterns, Clean Code, Craftsmanship culture, Refactoring, and Unit Testing.
- 5+ years of experience in at least one of the languages such as Java, Go, C#, Scala, Kotlin, Node.js.
- Experience in Relational/NonRelational Database Management Systems such as PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, Couchbase, etc.
- Experience in messaging software such as Kafka, RabbitMQ.
- Experience in Continuous Delivery and build pipelines.
- Experience building Restful backend services using popular frameworks such as Spring Boot.
- Agile-minded team player with good communication skills.
- Preferably experienced in distributed architecture with fault tolerance and loose coupling.
- Kubernetes experience and Performance Monitoring is a big plus.
- Good command of written and spoken English.

## Join Us and

- Take responsibility from day one and develop your skills with a talented and diverse international team.
- Experience open communication, flexibility, and a start-up spirit in our unique culture.
- Tackle big challenges in e-commerce with Agile practices and encourage growth by learning from mistakes.
- Join creative and focused teams that prioritize collaboration and problem-solving.
- Access our extensive training platform for continuous learning and personal growth.
- Benefit from the support of a global team of experts with mentoring and professional development opportunities.
- Focus on talent and potential, not just job titles.
- Connect with teammates regardless of physical distance through events, meetings, and social activities.
- Enjoy competitive benefits such as PIA shopping budget, central and international office locations, and top-of-the-line technical equipment.

We're looking forward to receiving your application!

## Hybrid Working Model

We embrace a hybrid working model that seamlessly blends the best of both worldsâ€”remote productivity and the collaborative energy of our vibrant offices. Every month, we gather at our offices once to work side by side, fostering in-person communication and embracing the camaraderie that fuels our team spirit. These sessions are crucial for teamwork in solving complex issues, socializing, learning from each other, and experiencing our culture.

Each division has a pre-set optional office day each week. Based on our preferences, we come together at our offices at our discretion as an opportunity to feel more team spirit, immerse in our culture, and familiarize ourselves with our way of workings.

We offer the opportunity for a two-month full remote work program, allowing you to work from abroad, during the summer period (July to August).

This working model applies to our hybrid job postings; on-site roles require being based in an office work environment.

Discover more about our #LifeatPIA and our culture on our Website, LinkedIn, and YouTube channels.

### Inclusive Workplace

At PIA, we believe in the power of an inclusive workplace. We value diversity and believe that every team member contributes to our vibrant culture. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. We encourage the representation and amplification of diverse voices in our business, as it allows us all to thrive, contribute, and shape the future together.

#### Ready to learn more about us?

Founded in 2012, we have always embraced innovation and creativity. With the trust of over 20 million users and 150,000 developers, we are a pioneering force in the tech industry. Backed by investors like Sequoia Capital, Andreessen Horowitz, and Fidelity, we expanded our presence with offices in San Francisco, London, and Tokyo. This is just the beginning!

#### Tech at the root

We believe that technology is the key driver and our products are the outcome. With the commitment of our team, we have become a leading company in AI and machine learning globally, serving clients in over 30 countries.

#### Growth is in our DNA

As a forward-thinking company, we are continuously evolving. With our cutting-edge R&D center, rapid product development, and a focus on AI-driven solutions, we are set to lead the tech world.

#### Focused on positive impact

Our vision extends beyond business achievements. We aim to make a positive impact on our users, partners, and society by driving digital transformation and promoting ethical AI practices.

#### ABOUT THE TEAM

If you are a tech enthusiast, you belong in our Technology Team that develops scalable, high-performance platforms using the latest technologies.

We are united by a common goal: To create a positive impact through technology.

#### Your Main Responsibilities

You will develop new features, enhance the existing platform, and contribute to the overall experience and scalability. Continuous learning and skill development with your team members is a key part of the role.

#### Qualities We Are Looking For

- Collaborative - a lifelong learner with a customer-first mindset.
- Solid understanding of OOP, Design Patterns, Clean Code, and Unit Testing.
- 5+ years experience in languages such as Python, JavaScript, Ruby, C++, Swift.
- Experience with Relational/NonRelational Databases like MySQL, MongoDB.
- Proficient in messaging systems like RabbitMQ, ZeroMQ.
- Familiar with Continuous Delivery and build pipelines.
- Experience with modern frameworks like Django, Flask.
- Agile mindset with strong communication skills.
- Familiarity with distributed architecture and microservices.
- Docker and Kubernetes experience is a plus.
- Fluent in English.

#### JOIN US AND

- Take on responsibilities from day one and grow your skills with an international team.
- Experience open communication and a startup culture.
- Tackle tech challenges with Agile practices.
- Access extensive training for personal and professional growth.
- Benefit from global mentoring and development opportunities.
- Focus on talent and potential beyond job titles.
- Connect through events, meetings, and social activities.
- Enjoy competitive benefits, including flexible work arrangements and top-tier equipment.

We're excited to receive your application!

We offer a hybrid working model that combines remote productivity and in-office collaboration. Monthly in-person sessions foster teamwork and culture.

Our offices are open weekly for those who prefer in-person collaboration. We also offer a two-month remote work option in summer.

This model applies to hybrid roles; on-site roles require office presence.

Discover more about #LifeatTechInnovators on our Website, LinkedIn, and YouTube channels.

We believe in an inclusive workplace. Diversity enriches our culture, enabling us to thrive and shape the future together.

#### Ready to learn more about us?

Founded in 2015, we are revolutionizing the healthcare industry with cutting-edge technology. Trusted by over 15 million patients and backed by top investors like Accel, Khosla Ventures, and NEA, we have expanded our presence with offices in New York, London, and Singapore.

We believe that technology drives healthcare innovation. Our dedicated team has made us a leader in health tech, providing solutions that improve patient care and streamline medical processes globally.

#### Focused on positive impact

Our vision extends beyond business success. We aim to positively impact patients, healthcare providers, and communities by enhancing healthcare access and quality through technology.

#### Ready to learn more about us?

Established in 2012, we are pioneers in health technology, dedicated to transforming healthcare delivery globally. Trusted by healthcare providers and patients alike, our innovative solutions have earned acclaim from leading medical institutions and investors including Sequoia Capital and GV.

#### Tech at the root

We believe technology is the cornerstone of modern healthcare. Our advanced platforms and medical innovations enable personalized, efficient, and accessible healthcare solutions for all.

#### Growth is in our DNA

As a rapidly expanding company, we continue to push the boundaries of health technology. With cutting-edge R&D, partnerships with medical experts, and a commitment to improving patient outcomes, we aim to revolutionize healthcare.

#### Focused on positive impact

Beyond business success, our vision is to make a lasting impact on global healthcare. By empowering healthcare providers, enhancing patient care, and advancing medical research, we strive to create healthier communities worldwide.

#### ABOUT THE TEAM

Join our Technology Team to build robust, scalable platforms that redefine healthcare delivery using state-of-the-art technologies.

We are driven by a common purpose: To improve lives through innovative healthcare solutions.

#### Your Main Responsibilities

You will develop new features, optimize existing platforms, and scale our solutions to enhance healthcare experiences. Continuous learning and collaboration with your team are integral to your role.

#### Qualities We Are Looking For

- Collaborative - a lifelong learner with a passion for improving healthcare outcomes.
- Strong knowledge of OOP, Design Patterns, Clean Code, and Test-Driven Development.
- 5+ years experience in languages such as Python, Java, C#, or JavaScript.
- Experience with healthcare data management systems, including EMRs and health information exchanges.
- Proficiency in cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices.
- Excellent communication skills and a team-oriented mindset.
- Understanding of distributed systems and microservices architecture.
- Knowledge of healthcare compliance and regulatory requirements is a plus.
- Fluent in English.

#### JOIN US AND

- Take ownership of impactful projects and grow your skills within a global team.
- Experience a collaborative and innovative work environment.
- Address complex healthcare challenges using Agile methodologies.
- Access comprehensive training programs for continuous professional development.
- Benefit from mentorship and career growth opportunities.
- Focus on individual talents and potential, not just job titles.
- Engage with colleagues through team events, meetings, and social activities.
- Enjoy competitive benefits, including remote work options and wellness initiatives.

We look forward to receiving your application!

Our hybrid working model combines remote flexibility with in-office collaboration. Monthly team gatherings promote camaraderie and teamwork.

Weekly optional office days are available for those who prefer in-person interactions. Additionally, we offer a two-month remote work program during the summer.

This model applies to hybrid roles; on-site positions require physical presence.

Explore more about #LifeatHealthTech on our Website, LinkedIn, and YouTube channels.

We embrace diversity in our workplace, believing it enriches our culture and drives innovation in healthcare.

Guide tourists and provide information on attractions.
Plan and book travel arrangements for clients.

Manage farm operations and staff.
Conduct research on crop production and soil management.

Write scripts for films and TV shows.
Develop and implement marketing strategies.
